4. Interstellar (2014) - Directed by Christopher Nolan, this visually stunning movie follows a group of astronauts as they travel through wormholes in search of a new home for humanity, grappling with the challenges of time dilation and the mysteries of space.
5. Ex Machina (2014) - This psychological sci-fi thriller directed by Alex Garland explores the ethics of artificial intelligence and the blurring of lines between man and machine through the eyes of a young programmer who is invited to administer the Turing test to an intelligent humanoid robot.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful and enjoy watching some of these movies!
